structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases
Conduct Of Public Officials And Employees

law.catch_line: Disclosures And Certifications; Form; Public Inspection
law.text: All disclosures and certifications provided for in this chapter and made in accordance with its provisions shall be made in writing and, unless otherwise specifically provided in this chapter, shall be kept open to inspection by the public by the official with whom such disclosure has been filed.
